page.title: 0510-11 YR CHILDREN'S PLAY
page.content: A LOT OF{GIRLS}PLAY IN THEIR HOME STREET.MANY GIRLS ALSO PLAY ON THE FIELD IN BODMIN ROAD. EVERYONE ELSE PLAYS AT THE BULL'S HEAD, TOFFEE'S FIELD, MASON'S MOAT AND THE BROOK IN BODMIN ROAD. SOME OF THE GAMES WE PLAY ARE {CHASE, HIDE AND SEEK }AND{COCKIE {RUSTY.} MOST{BOYS}PLAY IN THE STREET BUT SOME PLAY IN SPECIAL PLACES ACCORDING TO WHERE THEY LIVE. SOME BOYS PLAY ON THE BRIDLE PATH, BLACK PATH, SCHOOL FIELD OR AT ELLESMERE STREET FIELDS.THE GAME THAT MOST BOYS PLAY IS {FOOTBALL. SOME{RIDE BICYCLES}AND OTHERS DO {BODY-POPPING. COCKIE RUSTY}IS A WIDE CATCHING GAME AND{BODY-POPPING}IS A SORT OF DANCING IN WHICH THE BODY MAKES WAVE-LIKE MOVEMENTS AND AN ILLUSION OF OPPOSITE MOVES.
